person.persName: Mary Lawrence Tyler Johnson (Wife of Confederate Colonel Charles Flournoy Johnson)

body.p: Residence: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky. Daughter of Robert Tyler and Mary Lawrence Tyler. Married Colonel F. Johnson, c1855. Devout member of the Episcopal Church. Obituary notes her charitable work.
